alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 4:15AM EST until December 11 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Wet Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The Berkshires of western Massachusetts and the northern and central Taconics and Helderbergs of eastern New York. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow covered and slushy roads along with reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest accumulations will be across the high terrain, as well as on grassy and non-paved surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
